titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University collection of The Medical Letter publication
A Guide to the Rockefeller University collection of The Medical Letter publication FA1652

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-05-01 00:56:18 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University collection of The Medical Letter publication

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Processed records more than 25 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact a RAC archivist.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in three collections. The collections are representative solely of when the materials were processed by RAC, and do not imply an original order of the records. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Material consists of files used in preparing articles for THE MEDICAL LETTER. Each file consists of drafts of the article, letters from consultants and manufacturers; and copies of published articles from the medical and scientific literature which were used in preparing the articles.
